author: Jennifer Bray
title: Coronavirus: Cross - Border travel to be monitored over weekend
description: Further 200 beds secured to protect residents in direct provision centres
content:
Cross-Border travel will be monitored by gardaí and the PSNI ahead of the bank holiday weekend to ensure that travel restrictions because of coronavirus are being adhered to.
At the Governments morning Covid-19 briefing, assistant secretary general in the De… [+3152 chars]
